testcase.name: User go to the Amazon website and search for the book.
testcase.system-out: Given User go to Google page................................................passed When User pass "Amazon" text option in the google search box................passed And User clicks on button button............................................passed Then User enter to the Amazon home page.....................................passed And User pass the book "The Lost World by Arthur Conan Doyle" in amazon search box.passed And User click on search button.............................................passed Then user go to the search reasult page and find the total books result.....passed When User change the language "French" using filter option..................passed Then User finds a different count for that particular book search...........passed
